articles.title: Borderlands 3 developer Gearbox purchased for $1.3 billion by Embracer Group - Gamesradar
articles.description: The Borderlands developer will look to expand its two current studios in Texas and Quebec
articles.content:
Borderlands 3 developer Gearbox Entertainment has been bought for $1.3 billion by the Embracer Group.
